title.rendered: “IDF Retaliates: Strikes Missile Launch Sites and Hezbollah Military Bases in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF struck the launch site from which missiles were fired towards Kiryat Shmona earlier today and military buildings in southern Lebanon.

The IDF attacked with artillery fire the source of the launch detected earlier today towards Kiryat Shmona.

In addition, fighter jets attacked military buildings used by the Hezbollah terror organization in the Kafr Kila and Tire Harfa areas in southern Lebanon.

Earlier today, several launches from Lebanese territory towards the Metula and Hermon areas were identified. The IDF attacked their sources with artillery fire.

Attached is documentation from the attack: https://bit.ly/48bqMf1
